column4: anyone know offhand if there's any difference between the Dapper live disc dl, the Dapper alt install download and the uhh uhh Dapper CDs sent via ship-it in terms of the software initially included?
they're all the same once installed
I do that with some custom XMMS plugins.. as long as it's not system-critical you should be ok.. but if it goes in /usr/lib or something you might want to avoid that
